TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Sado, title = Sado, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sado} }

S.FORM: == Sado == u sulit nu Hulam: 砂荖部落 u siwkay nu niyazu' i Hualien a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Sado. u kasalumaluma' nu Sado sa, 98 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 272 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 246 ku tademaw, pakalatu 90%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 26 ku tademaw, pakalatu 10%. u sausi nu cidekay a tademaw u kasabinacadan, Pangcah(Amis) 85%, Kevelan(Kebalan) 1%, zumazuma 3%. u Pangcah a niyazu' u kasabinacadan, Pangcah(Amis) 50%, Tayan(Tayal) 1%, Taluku(Truku) 1%, zumazuma 2%. u pangca sa, u cidekay nu Taywan Incumin. tusa a bataan a mang ku tademaw. mueneng i Kalinku i Pusung atu i dadipasan nu bayu'an. satuuday a cidekay u Pangcah. u Sakizaya a tademaw izaw tu ku Sakizaya a tademaw itini, namabulaw i 1878 tayni milimek. siiluc tu tina niyazu'. nasulitan ni Liaw Socen. u cidekay nu Taywan Yincumin: u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). u Pangcah cidekay a tademaw si207940, katukuh 2017-9. tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2017 a mihca 10 a bulad tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 5 a bulad pulung sausi (561,916), Pangcah (209,668), Tayan (90,185), Paywan (100,775), Yuwatan (58,465), Rukay (13,319), Puyuma (14,170), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,630), Yami (4,612), Saw (790), Kabalan (1,470), Taluku (31,530), Sakizaya (940), Sejek (10,023), Laaluwa (401), Kanakanabu (335), zuma (11,985)

== Sado == o solit no Holam: 砂荖部落 o siwkay no niyazo' i Hoalien a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Sado. o kasalomaloma' no Sado sa, 98 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 272 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 246 ko tademaw, pakalato 90%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 26 ko tademaw, pakalato 10%. o saosi no cidekay a tademaw o kasabinacadan, Pangcah(Amis) 85%, Kevelan(Kebalan) 1%, zomazoma 3%. o Pangcah a niyazo' o kasabinacadan, Pangcah(Amis) 50%, Tayan(Tayal) 1%, Taloko(Troko) 1%, zomazoma 2%. o pangca sa, o cidekay no Taywan Incomin. tosa a bataan a mang ko tademaw. moeneng i Kalinko i Posong ato i dadipasan no bayo'an. satooday a cidekay o Pangcah. o Sakizaya a tademaw izaw to ko Sakizaya a tademaw itini, namabolaw i 1878 tayni milimek. siiloc to tina niyazo'. nasolitan ni Liaw Socen. o cidekay no Taywan Yincomin: o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). o Pangcah cidekay a tademaw si207940, katokoh 2017-9. tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2017 a mihca 10 a bolad tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 5 a bolad polong saosi (561,916), Pangcah (209,668), Tayan (90,185), Paywan (100,775), Yowatan (58,465), Rokay (13,319), Poyoma (14,170), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,630), Yami (4,612), Saw (790), Kabalan (1,470), Taloko (31,530), Sakizaya (940), Sejek (10,023), Laalowa (401), Kanakanabo (335), zoma (11,985)
